welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nishio, Japan! This charming city is known for its traditional tea ceremonies, beautiful pottery, and historic temples. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the rich culture and beauty of Nishio. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.address: 斉藤町郷中8-1, 西尾市, 愛知県, 445-0056
